replies.body: Could Syndra’s Queen of Hearts orbs be colored red? Asking for a friend who really wants to purchase the skin but sees the purple balls contrasting the red theme of her skin.
Unfortunately that's not likely since it's a 750 skin, which don't have custom particles.

iirc its not the 750 price point that's the main problem with them being red or not. It's gameplay, and the amount of counterplay revolved around her orbs. Red just made them read wrong in 0.1 second decision making situations.

I have no link to back that up though, just something I seem to remember reading when the skin was new.
Maybe someday, in the far future, if she ever gets a VGU.
